title: 求助帖！1.7.2forge纯净客户端启动就崩！
author: 是夏栀呀
txt_content:
[03:58:01] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[03:58:01] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Using primary tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[03:58:01] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[03:58:01] [main/INFO] [FML]: Forge Mod Loader version 7.2.211.1121 for Minecraft 1.7.2 loading
[03:58:01] [main/INFO] [FML]: Java is Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM, version 1.8.0_92, running on Windows 7:amd64:6.1, installed at C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_92
[03:58:01] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker
[03:58:01] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLDeobfTweaker
[03:58:01] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker
[03:58:01] [main/ERROR] [LaunchWrapper]: Unable to launch
java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
        at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.checkForComodification(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_92]
        at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.remove(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_92]
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:117) [launchwrapper-1.9.jar:?]
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28) [launchwrapper-1.9.jar:?]挺急的！！！ 1.7.2的版本 纯净可以进但是加了forge就进不去了！mod都没加！

replies.author: 南执丶
replies.txt_content: 你下个java7试试  不删java8  登陆时候改路径就行

replies.author: 东东yang
replies.txt_content: 要什么版本的，我发给你，看看能不能用

replies.author: 甲壳虫Luca
replies.txt_content:
你得换java 7
网上可以搜到，建议用64位

replies.author: YNG_GAMER
replies.txt_content: 用JAVA7试一下（1.7.10之前的版本用的都是JAVA7）
